Enhanced Clinical Workflow.businessValue: Reduced clinical documentation time with 15-20 minutes per case savings

prdDetails.businessImpact: Improved clinical efficiency, reduced documentation burden, enhanced patient care

Mobile Platform Foundation.businessValue: Spanish-speaking market access enabled with 40M+ addressable users

prdDetails.vision: Establish mobile platform foundation for market expansion
prdDetails.businessImpact: Market expansion, increased accessibility, mobile user engagement

prdDetails.businessImpact: Improved user experience, reduced support burden, enhanced system reliability

prdDetails.businessImpact: Competitive advantage, enhanced diagnostic capabilities, premium feature offering
